Created 29.9.1878 from the parishes of New Accrington and Old Accrington. 
    Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the Hyndburn unparished area. See also 
    Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from the parts of the parishes of Newchurch and Spotland 
    in Bacup Municipal Borough. Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the 
    Rossendale unparished area. 
    See also Table 2, notes (a) and (e).
